languages.text: "Речь о запуске варп-двигателя в обход всех вероятностей во время нашего бегства из системы Райкад. Чудо третьей категории, явленное нам машинным духом корабля! А защита до этого... во время штурма культистами?"

traits.locale_text: "Речь о запсуке варп-двигателя в обход всех вероятностей во время нашего бегства из системы Райкад. Чудо третьей категории, явленное нам машинным духом корабля! А защита до этого... во время штурма пиратами?"

languages.text: "The warp engine activation against all probability during our escape from the Rykad System. The Category Three miracle manifested by the ship's machine spirit! And the part about protecting... Was it during the cultist attack?"
languages.original_text: "Речь о запуске варп-двигателя в обход всех вероятностей во время нашего бегства из системы Райкад. Чудо третьей категории, явленное нам машинным духом корабля! А защита до этого... во время штурма культистами?"

traits.locale_text: "The warp engine activation against all probability during our escape from the Rykad System. The category-three miracle manifested by the ship's machine spirit! And the part about protecting... Was it during the pirate attack?"

"The warp engine activation against all probability during our escape from the Rykad System. The category-three miracle manifested by the ship's machine spirit! And the part about protecting... Was it during the pirate attack?"

"The warp engine activation against all probability during our escape from the Rykad System. The category-three miracle manifested by the ship's machine spirit! And the part about protecting... Was it during the pirate attack?"

"The warp engine activation against all probability during our escape from the Rykad System. The category-three miracle manifested by the ship's machine spirit! And the part about protecting... Was it during the pirate attack?"

"The warp engine activation against all probability during our escape from the Rykad System. The category-three miracle manifested by the ship's machine spirit! And the part about protecting... Was it during the cultist attack?"

"The warp engine activation against all probability during our escape from the Rykad System. The Category Three miracle manifested by the ship's machine spirit! And the part about protecting... Was it during the cultist attack?"

languages.text: 「ライカドシステムから脱出する間の全ての可能性に対する<歪み>エンジンの作動。この船の機械精霊により起こったカテゴリー3の奇跡！そして保護するところ…あれは魔女団の攻撃の間だったか？」
languages.original_text: "The warp engine activation against all probability during our escape from the Rykad System. The Category Three miracle manifested by the ship's machine spirit! And the part about protecting... Was it during the cultist attack?"

traits.locale_text: 「ライカドシステムから脱出する間の全ての可能性に対する<歪み>エンジンの作動。この船の機械精霊により起こったカテゴリー3の奇跡！そして保護するところ…あれは海賊の攻撃の間だったか？」

languages.text: “当我们逃离莱卡德星系期间，亚空间引擎在几乎无法激活的情况下奇迹般地撑住了，这正是飞船机魂展现的第三类奇迹！至于保护的那部分……是发生在异端分子袭击期间吗？”
languages.original_text: "The warp engine activation against all probability during our escape from the Rykad System. The Category Three miracle manifested by the ship's machine spirit! And the part about protecting... Was it during the cultist attack?"

traits.locale_text: “当我们逃离莱卡德星系期间，亚空间引擎在几乎无法激活的情况下奇迹般地撑住了，这正是飞船机魂展现的第三类奇迹！至于保护的那部分……是发生在海盗袭击期间吗？”

languages.text: "Die Aktivierung des Warp-Triebwerks gegen alle Wahrscheinlichkeit während unserer Flucht aus dem Rykad-System. Das Wunder der Kategorie 3, das vom Maschinengeist des Schiffs manifestiert wurde! Und das mit dem Beschützen ... War das während des Kultistenangriffs?"
languages.original_text: "The warp engine activation against all probability during our escape from the Rykad System. The Category Three miracle manifested by the ship's machine spirit! And the part about protecting... Was it during the cultist attack?"

traits.locale_text: "Die Aktivierung des Warp-Triebwerks gegen alle Wahrscheinlichkeit während unserer Flucht aus dem Rykad-System. Das Wunder der Kategorie 3, das vom Maschinengeist des Schiffs manifestiert wurde! Und das mit dem Beschützen ... War das während des Piratenangriffs?"

languages.text: « L'activation contre toute attente du moteur Warp lors de notre fuite du système de Rykad. Le miracle de catégorie 3 manifesté par l'esprit de la machine du vaisseau ! Et cette histoire de protection... Était-ce pendant l'attaque des cultistes ? »
languages.original_text: "The warp engine activation against all probability during our escape from the Rykad System. The Category Three miracle manifested by the ship's machine spirit! And the part about protecting... Was it during the cultist attack?"

traits.locale_text: « L'activation contre toute attente du moteur Warp lors de notre fuite du système de Rykad. Le miracle de catégorie 3 manifesté par l'esprit de la machine du vaisseau ! Et cette histoire de protection... Était-ce pendant l'attaque des pirates ? »

languages.text: «La activación del motor de disformidad contra toda probabilidad durante nuestra huida del sistema Rykad. ¡El milagro de categoría tres que se manifestó por obra y gracia del espíritu máquina de la nave! Y esa parte sobre protegerle... ¿fue durante el ataque de los cultistas?».
languages.original_text: "The warp engine activation against all probability during our escape from the Rykad System. The Category Three miracle manifested by the ship's machine spirit! And the part about protecting... Was it during the cultist attack?"

traits.locale_text: «La activación del motor de disformidad contra toda probabilidad durante nuestra huida del sistema Rykad. ¡El milagro de categoría tres que se manifestó por obra y gracia del espíritu máquina de la nave! Y esa parte sobre protegerle... ¿fue durante el ataque de los piratas?».

languages.text: "Rykad Sistemi'nden kaçarken tüm olasılıklara karşı öteboyut motoru aktivasyonu. Üçüncü Kategori mucize, geminin makine ruhunun iradesiyle tecelli etti! Koruma kısmına gelince... Tarikatçı saldırısı esnasında mı gerçekleşti?"
languages.original_text: "The warp engine activation against all probability during our escape from the Rykad System. The Category Three miracle manifested by the ship's machine spirit! And the part about protecting... Was it during the cultist attack?"

traits.locale_text: "Rykad Sistemi'nden kaçarken tüm olasılıklara karşı öteboyut motoru aktivasyonu. Üçüncü Kategori mucize, geminin makine ruhunun iradesiyle tecelli etti! Koruma kısmına gelince... Tarikatçı saldırısı esnasında mı gerçekleşti?"
